name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior SBC Engineer with over 10 years of experience in designing and delivering cloud-native architectures and microservices. Proficient in **VoIP**, **VoLTE**, and **SBC** frameworks, with strong skills in **SIP**, **H.248**, and **Diameter** protocols. Familiar with data analytics, and **Machine Learning** implementations. Extensive expertise in high-performing systems, employing **AWS** and **Azure** for streamlined cloud solutions. Demonstrated ability to create scalable APIs and services in diverse environments, bolstered by experience at leading organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska. Committed to leveraging cutting-edge technologies like **FastAPI**, **Django**, and **Kubernetes** to drive innovative project outcomes.

Deployed microservices on **Azure App Services** and utilized **Terraform** for Infrastructure as Code, enabling seamless cloud operations and reducing deployment times by **50%**.
Created and maintained data pipelines for regulatory data exchange with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, ensuring timely and accurate data flow with an uptime of over **99.9%**.
Led security assessments to integrate **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for secure and scalable authentication systems, improving overall security by **40%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to address system integration challenges and ensure compliance with **3GPP** and **IETF** standards, overseeing release strategies effectively.

• Designed and implemented scalable **microservices** architectures to support **VoIP** and **SBC** functionalities, ensuring high availability and robust performance in handling **3GPP** and **IETF** protocols.

Leveraged technologies such as **HTTP(S)**, **TLS**, and **IPsec** to secure data transmission while maintaining compliance with rigorous data protection regulations.

Implemented **data analytics** and machine learning techniques, resulting in predictive outcomes that improved traffic management by 25%.
